original_text: And the Lord said to me, “Son of man, mark well, see with your eyes, and hear with your ears all that I shall tell you concerning all the statutes of the temple of the Lord and all its laws. And mark well the entrance to the temple and all the exits from the sanctuary.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 인자야 너는 전심으로 주목하여 내가 네게 말하는 바 여호와의 성전의 모든 규례와 모든 율례를 귀로 듣고 또 성전의 입구와 성소의 출구를 전심으로 주목하고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to me,
all that I shall tell you
concerning all the statutes of the temple of the Lord
And mark well the entrance to the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 또 전의 들어가는 문을 자세히 보고

sentences.original_text: and all the exits from the sanctuary.
sentences.korean_translation: 성소에서 나가는 모든 문을 자세히 보라
